attributes.action: Government to retain control of First Aid Qualifications
attributes.additional_details: Based on a report the Government wants to stop registering organisations that deliver first aid.This means that it will be easy for criminals and incompetent people to infiltrate the system.The government should retain control of first aid  courses and reduce the costs involved in doing so.Alternatively a register of organisations should be maintained by the Government to reassure people that their training provider is competent and safe
